alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 3:22AM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Scattered snow showers and patchy freezing drizzle are expected. Additional snow accumulations will be an inch or less through daybreak, with an additional glaze of ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...All of northern New York and the western and north central sections of Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions will continue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy road conditions will continue to exist through the early morning hours as most areas have temperatures at or below freezing. Difficult travel and reduced visibilities due to light wintry precipitation and fog are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin; Western Rutland
